item.description:
***Tentative bar crawl list***
Since we'll be making our way to Criterion, I figured we would do the following bars:

Rudy's afterwork-8
Sullivan's 8-9
Richter's 9-10
BAR 10-11 (since they have an open bar from 10-11 on Friday nights)

I hope you notice the walking progression of bars listed, I think that will suit our motley crew just fine.

I'll be working some specials as well, I'll have to place some calls or if any of you people know the owners and can maybe work a deal or two, that would be much appreciated.
************************
"That boy is a P-I-G...pig!"


Criterion Cinemas' Insomnia Theater will be showing this quintessential college movie that I've seen religiously and I believe is required viewing.

Join me for this night of debauchery! Well....let's not go completely crazy, I'm not about to bail anyone out of jail, but I'm planning on hitting a couple bars ahead of time before this movie, so I'll be sure to update this event accordingly.

I'll be your host for the night, Christine_H and you can reach me at (203) 583-0932 or by email.
item.name: Animal House
